channel.title: Mumble on Guowei Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Mumble on Guowei Lv

item.title: Do you have a good taste of what you are doing?
item.description: There is this stereotype impression about technology industry, that it is a cruel game only for energetic and ambitious young men, when you get old, you will be kicked out mercilessly. This doesn’t bother me so much since I was still young a few years ago, but since now I am getting older it starts to act as a background noise that grabbed me more and more attention. Is this the truth?
